text: E jenumanja achinaŵandu! Mun'jogopani M'mbuje gwenu jwaŵan'gumbile kuumila mwa mundu jumpempe (Adamu), ni jwagumbile kuumila mwa jwalakwejo ŵankwakwe (Hawa), ni jwajenesye kuumila mu ŵaŵiliwo achalume ŵajinji kwisa soni achakongwe, ni mun'jogopani Allah Jwankasaŵendanaga kupitila mu Jwalakwejo, ni (jogopani soni kata) maulongo ga kupagwana. Chisimu Allah pa jenumanja aŵele Nkung'unulila kusyene (jwaakuŵa ali nkukalolechesya kalikose kankutenda)
